column1: #Text=But I think I found a clue .
#Text=" Korra says : " Xai Bau 's Grove , sundown .
#Text=This must be where and when Aiwei 's going to meet Zaheer !
#Text=" Bolin says : " Well , are n't you a cute little spir - Ow !
#Text=" Bolin says : " I think there might be a couple bounty hunters over there who recognize me !
#Text=" Mako says : " Okay , I think we 're clear .
#Text=We should head back to Korra before someone else recognizes us .
#Text=" Bolin says : " We could , or ... we could follow Aiwei instead .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Ting - Ting always finds his man .
#Text=" Mako says : " Keep an eye on him .
